meanings.definition: Form a mental image of something
meanings.sent1: I can visualise the beach with white sand and blue water.
meanings.sent2: Close your eyes and try to visualise a red apple in your mind.
meanings.sent3: When I visualise my dog wearing sunglasses, it always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: She could visualise the finish line of the race, motivating her to keep running.
meanings.sent5: Visualise a peaceful garden with colorful flowers to relax your mind.

meanings.definition: Imagine or remember something in a visual way
meanings.sent1: Let's visualise a big birthday cake with lots of candles on top.
meanings.sent2: As you read the story, try to visualise the characters and scenes in your head.
meanings.sent3: I like to visualise myself as a superhero flying through the sky.
meanings.sent4: She could visualise the map of the city in her mind, guiding her way home.
meanings.sent5: Visualise a rainbow stretching across the sky after the rain.
